name: Questery
description:
You woke up in a medieval castle. What happened to you? Why are you here? One thing you know for sure: you need to get out of this unfortunate place as soon as possible! Overcome tricky traps, find answers to complex puzzles and unleash war between two knightly clans. Only in this way will you achieve the desired freedom!
We are waiting for you in Questery! Features
  • Full control over the character. Move your hands and body, grab the objects!

  • Interactive Environment

  • 2 levels that you have to go through. Their number will grow!
In the Development Of
  • Multiplayer! We want to give you the opportunity to play with a friend
